CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV explains the Warm-up task to MOT and leaves the room
CHI looks up at MOT while holding a toy duck
MOT picks up the toy car
MOT rolls the car in front of CHI
CHI watches MOT then leans forward touching the jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT pushes the jack+in+the+box toward CHI
MOT closes the jack+in+the+box then turns the handle
MOT leans back watching CHIthe jack+in+the+box pop open
MOT pushes the clown back in the box
MOT closes the lid then turns the handle
CHI looks down at the jack+in+the+box then glances up at MOT briefly
CHI reaches out and touches the clown
MOT leans back and watches CHI
MOT holds the clown and pretends it is talking to CHI
MOT pretends the clown is talking
MOT taps the head of the clown
MOT pushes the clown into the box
CHI reaches for the clown and touches it
<aft> CHI tries to close the lid
MOT pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box and closes the lid
CHI tries to shut the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches for CHI hand and places it on the clown
CHI pushes the clown down with MOT assistance
CHI moves his hand away and watches MOT
MOT looks at CHI then reaches for the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT touches the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT reaches for CHI hand and moves it onto the handle
CHI tries to open the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks up at MOT then around the room briefly
<aft> MOT leans back and looks down in the direction of CHI
CHI reaches out for the clown
MOT reaches over and picks up the duck that was on the floor in front of CHI . MOT looks down at the duck
MOT holds the duck in front of CHI and squeezes it
CHI reaches over and takes the duck from MOT
CHI leans back and looks down at the duck then looks over at the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at the duck then across the room
CHI holds the duck out at arms length then looks up at MOT
CHI reaches forward and picks up the duck then reaches over and touches the tape on the floor
CHI gets up on his knees in front of MOT then reaches for a toy
<aft> MOT moves the jack+in+the+box out of CHI way
CHI sits back and looks at the football
MOT reaches over and touches CHI chest with the ball
<aft> MOT deposits the ball in CHIs lap
CHI picks the duck up and squeezes it
MOT reaches over for the football on CHI lap . <aft> MOT picks up the football and looks at it
<aft> MOT holds the ball up in front of CHI
MOT squeezes the duck near CHI's face
MOT squeezes the duck and gives it to CHI
CHI chews the duck and then drops it
MOT squeezes the duck and then puts it down
CHI holds the duck while trying to close the jack+in+the+box
MOT pulls the jack+in+the+box near her
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
<aft> CHI looks up at MOT briefly then back down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT wiggles the clown in the jack+in+the+box
<$=1> MOT pretends the clown is talking to CHI
MOT wiggles the clown while speaking
CHI watches MOT then looks around on the floor for something . <aft> CHI looks at jack+in+the+box
<aft> CHI reaches for the football then reaches over for the duck instead
MOT watches CHI then reaches over and takes the duck from CHI
MOT squeezes the duck in CHI face

INV enters room to explain Small Scale activity to MOT then leaves while Small Scale activity takes place . INV reenters , clears the table of the toys from Small Scale Activity and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT , having her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the squeezy toy to hold
INV puts the Forbidden Object on the table and sets the balls in motion
CHI reaches out to touch the object
CHI reaches for the object again then stares at it
CHI reaches for the object again
MOT prevents CHI from touching the object
MOT reaches for something on the floor
CHI turns and looks in the direction of MOT . <aft> CHI reaches for the object
<bef> MOT taps the rolling pin on the table to get CHI's attention
MOT moves CHI hand away from the object using the rolling pin
CHI grabs a bauble and holds on to it firmly
MOT releases CHI grip on the bauble
CHI stares at the Forbidden object
MOT looks at CHI as she places the rolling pin in CHI hand
MOT bends down reaching for something on the floor
MOT sits up holding an object she picked up off the floor
MOT holds the tin dish in front of CHI
MOT holds the tin dish in front of CHI's face
MOT uses tin dish to reflect CHIs image in this sequence
MOT holds the dish in front of CHI face
CHI looks at the dish and then the object
CHI takes the object from MOT
CHI holds the dish up next to the object
MOT takes CHI's hand and pulls it away from the object
INV puts the Forbidden object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV collects the toys from Small Scale Activity and prepares to leave the room
MOT picks the ball box up
MOT holds the box above CHI
MOT sits down with the ball in front of CHI
CHI watches MOT then reaches for the ball
MOT holds the ball in front of CHI
CHI stares at the ball . <aft> CHI reaches for the ball
CHI reaches out for the ball
MOT pulls CHI around to face her
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI tries to catch the ball
MOT throws the ball into CHI's lap
MOT holds out her hands for the ball
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
MOT gives the ball back to CHI
MOT holds out her hands for the ball
CHI bangs the ball on the ground
MOT pushes the ball into CHI's lap
CHI looks off to one side then crawls away from MOT
MOT holds the ball in front of CHI
CHI turns around and faces MOT . CHI looks down to the floor
MOT rolls the ball into CHI's lap
CHI pays no attention to MOT
MOT rolls the ball to CHI again
MOT puts the ball into the box
MOT takes the towel out of the box
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face then lowers it and looks at CHI
MOT lifts the towel up and down
CHI turns away from MOT and crawls off
CHI crawls over to the door
CHI pays no attention to MOT and crawls around rapidly
MOT waves the towel in front of CHI
MOT gets up on her knees
CHI crawls past MOT towards the table
MOT goes over to the boxes
MOT holds the towel up in front of her face
CHI sits on the floor and looks up
CHI looks away from MOT and down at the floor
CHI reaches for the tape on the floor
MOT examines the boxes and is partially out of camera range
MOT rummmages around in the boxes
MOT looks over her shoulder at CHI
<aft> MOT takes paper out of the box
CHI crawls toward the table then sits on the floor
MOT takes a piece of paper out of the box
MOT holds a piece of paper in her hand
MOT puts the paper on the floor behind CHI
MOT taps CHI on the shoulder to get his attention
CHI looks over his shoulder toward MOT then turns around . <aft> CHI kneels over the paper on the floor looking down
CHI looks down with his back to the camera
CHI watches MOT then reaches for a crayon
MOT puts the crayon in front of CHI
CHI sits back while holding a crayon . CHI looks at the crayon
<aft> MOT picks up the crayon CHI dropped
CHI drops the crayon then picks the paper up
MOT puts the paper on the floor
MOT puts the crayon in CHI's hand
MOT pulls CHI's hand over to the paper
CHI looks down while pulling his hand away from MOT
MOT draws on the paper and then gives CHI the crayon
CHI holds the crayon and picks up the paper
MOT takes the paper from CHI and puts it away
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT holds the book up in front of CHI
MOT holds the book in front of CHI
CHI reaches out for the book
MOT points then looks over at CHI
MOT takes the book from CHI then opens it
<aft> CHI attempts to close the book
CHI leans back and looks at the book
MOT tilts the book to show CHI the hologram
CHI looks down at the book in his hands
MOT looks across the room at something then looks back at CHI
the book accidentally opens while CHI fidgets with it
MOT leans forward then points at the page
CHI tries to take the book from MOT
CHI closes the book and takes it from MOT
MOT takes the book from CHI and opens it
CHI takes the book from MOT
CHI looks at the book while holding it out in front of him
there is a long pause as MOT watches CHI
MOT reaches over for CHI and puts CHI on her lap
CHI pulls the book close to him
MOT speaks in a funny voice
CHI tries to close the book
CHI tries to close the book
CHI closed the book on MOT's fingers
CHI tries to close the book
MOT tries to keep the book open
MOT looks across the room then back at CHI
MOT looks at the activity table
CHI looks around while holding the book
